easy.dialogue: HALT THIEF! You're under arrest for unlawful entry and theft!
easy.response: Ouch those sirens and megaphones are sure going to take a toll on my lovely ears.

easy.dialogue: Officers, don't let that woman get away!
easy.response: Well I hope your buddies are good with heights~
